Usage a staff, bo staff, fighting stick, khakkara, or any weapon in the spear or polearm weapon group

This humble stick-like weapon has an elegant simplicity to it, affording you reliable strikes over flashy maneuvers.

Immanence The noble branch deals 2 additional spirit damage per weapon damage die to creatures it Strikes.

Transcendenceâ€”Strike, Breathe, Rend 1 (spirit, transcendence)

Requirements Your last action this turn was a successful Strike with the noble branch

Effect You channel a rending pulse of energy down your weapon in the moment of contact. The target of the Strike takes spirit damage equal to the noble branch's weapon damage dice. This includes any extra dice from striking runes, but not from special abilities, property runes, or the like.
